positions.description:
â¢	Attend weekly Lead meetings, communicate with and assist senior managers, applicants, and lead other team members in support of the Personnel Security Section's objectives and initiatives associated with all aspects of background investigations
â¢	Continually track, monitor, and update over 13,000 case statuses daily using the e-QIP website, Microsoft Access, and TSAâs Background Investigation Tracking System to generate a daily report for operations of the Personnel Security Section
â¢	Initiate up to 100 applicants weekly and conduct quality review  of e86, corresponding forms, and submit completed forms through the Office of Personnel Management e-QIP system in accordance to established guidelines
â¢	Regularly communicate with the Office of Personnel Management in order to answer inquiries and unacceptable cases within the established timelines
â¢	Quickly respond to high call volumes and e-mails from internal and external stakeholders in need of trouble-shooting assistance with the e-QIP application, inquiries about TSAâs vetting process, and updates on case status
â¢	Work with and train current employees and new applicants to ensure full compliance with OPM guidelines concerning paperwork and information associated with e-QIP
â¢	Analyze vetting of subjects criminal backgrounds through the National Crime Investigation Center (NCIC) to check for criminal history
â¢	Follow all guidelines in handling sensitive security information to maintain confidentiality of applicants.
â¢	Monitor and update applicant information in TSAâs Background Investigation Tracking System and the Integrated Security Management System to help ensure a timely completion
â¢	Apply knowledge of Security Programs within the Physical Security Division by utilizing equipment for fingerprinting and issuing PIVII cards under the HSPD-12 directive for contractors and federal employees
â¢	Consistently recognized for quality of work as well as volume of cases moved to pre-hire adjudication
positions.title: Lead Program Analyst
